name: UsageComponent

propertiesClass.name: percentage
propertiesClass.description: Percentage of usage. Value range is from 0 to 100 (or more). For example, if 10% is used, this value should be provided as 10 (not 0.1).
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Percentage of usage. Value range is from 0 to 100 (or more).
For example, if 10% is used, this value should be provided as 10 (not 0.1).

propertiesClass.name: usage
propertiesClass.description: Usage as a fraction (e.g. if 50% is used, usage value will be 0.5)
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Usage as a fraction (e.g. if 50% is used, usage value will be 0.5)

description:
Usage component displays usage information in a form of e.g. "51% used". It can be used in two ways:

  1. By providing count and limit inputs, it will calculate the usage percentage.
  2. By providing percentage input, it will use the provided percentage value. Note: percentage input takes precedence over count and limit inputs.
rawdescription:
Usage component displays usage information in a form of e.g. "51% used".
It can be used in two ways:
1. By providing `count` and `limit` inputs, it will calculate the usage percentage.
2. By providing `percentage` input, it will use the provided percentage value.
Note: `percentage` input takes precedence over `count` and `limit` inputs.
